name: Base Battles
description:
A Tug of War game for the Sept2020 Game Jam between UMBC, UMD, and AACC

Action, strategy, planning, deprivation

The game is simple. Lead gatherers to resources like Wheat and Iron ore which will then be used to summon an army. Battle it out with your opponent, try to over run them, and destroy both their base and them to win.
